alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 20 at 3:57AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Periods of freezing rain will result in total ice accumulations ranging between 0.20 to 0.30 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. The freezing rain may mix with or change to a period of sleet and or snow prior to ending late Friday Night or early Saturday. A trace to less than one-quarter of an inch sleet and snow accumulation is possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Carolina and southeast North Carolina. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The forecast ice accumulations will make traveling extremely hazardous if not impossible. Scattered to numerous power outages and tree damage will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures during Friday will hold at or below 32 degrees, before dropping well into the 20s Friday night into early Saturday.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry
